entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
